text: They closed on a single bundle and, fumbling with nervous excitement, he pulled it fivers!' he muttered again, and tried to recall if they were still legal tender. Surely the Govr. and Compa. of the Bank of England would never break their promise to pay on rude demand, let alone on polite request.
